title: How to mess up somebody's League account pls
body:
Hi all,

So we have this friend that is very annoying to be with in the room because he plays and shouts really loud, blames everybody whenever we play and lose when its mostly his fault we lose, and plays till 3am every day when most of us have early classes. He also keeps the volume up, keeps the light on, and is very inconsiderate of us, his rooommates. So what are some good ways to mess him up (ex. get his account banned, change his league password, etc.) because we are really getting fed up! In game, he is also a very toxic player even to us, his friends, and rage-quits all the time when its his fault he sucks!

replies.body:
I'd joke about banning him for an hour, but it sounds like he's well on his way if this keeps up.  Your friend sounds like an asshole, but he probably doesn't mean it.  Are you guys in school or could there be other stresses leading to this?  Honestly, ya'll should grab some McNuggets and talk to him face to face.  Give him that feedback, and let him know how playing with him feels.  Try not to use accusatory words though like always and never, but be pretty direct with what's going on.  It's also not a breakup, so let him know you're doing this because you want to keep playing!  Meaning, try and get some solutions in there.  

He'll probably get defensive, but it's a chance to grow and make things better!  You'll probably need to help him get there, and as his friend I'd expect that.   If it helps, we have a little[ infograph on how some players deal with all the salt ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/sZdrHNEP-long-infographic-i-asked-some-rioters-how-they-de-salt-after-a-bad-run-of-games?show=rundown)after a rough game.  --While you could simply share that with him, consider it your homework instead.  Take out some ideas from there and use it as an activity for you guys to do.

As much as I'd love a prank, this situation sounds like it could use some love.  There could be stress or frustrations causing some pain, and banning him probably won't help.  I'm just assuming here, of course.  

In the darkest timeline, you'd stop playing with him.  It's not too late to redeem him.  Won't you be the shining light?    Totally not listening to FFXV soundtrack while writing this.

Hi I have a similar friend. I don't really want to completely mess him up, but would very much like to teach him a lesson. Is there a way to mess him up temporarily like a prank or something? Thanks, Rito. Oh, and if you tell us to just straight up talk to him, we will do that, but AFTER teaching him a lesson. Thank you.
